subject: My throttle pedals isnt working.
description_text:
Hello, my name is Tyler and i bought a set of yalls pro x pedals about a
month ago, and now the throttle pedals isnt registering inputs anymore, let
me know what i can do.

conversations.body_text: 你好，CUTTER 90，  请检查这两个部件，看它们是否由于蓝色限位器调整得太紧而损坏。
